name: Onyx
headline: Open Source AI Assistant and Enterprise Search
description:
Onyx is the AI assistant that connects to all your company tools and docs and makes finding any piece of information a breeze. Think ChatGPT, but with access to all your companies documents (only the ones you have access to, of course :P). Or, if you know Glean, you can think about it like an open-source Glean. 

Concerned about your data? Don't worry we're open source (MIT license) and built to be self-hosted. You can setup Onyx in your VPC in less than 30 minutes - no packets ever have to leave your cloud.

Check us out on Github: https://github.com/onyx-dot-app/onyx!

founders.name: Yuhong Sun, Founder
founders.description: Expertise is in Machine Learning (with specialization in NLP) as well as backend systems. Previously working on Deep Learning for NL-to-SQL and Semantic Search at Alation, inc.

founders.name: Chris Weaver, Founder
founders.description:
Former TL on the anti-fraud engine team at Robinhood.

In a previous life, was a top-100 NA League of Legends player.

### Data
### Security
Run Onyx fully air gapped in your VPC or even on-premise.
No data needs to ever leave your deployment.
### Advanced
### Permission
Document level permissions automatically inherited from connected sources.
Easily create advanced access rules directly within Onyx.
### Most
### Extensible
Modular, open-source, and easy to customize.
Plug in custom tools, processing modules, and UI elements to make Onyx work the way you need it to.
### Model
### Agnostic
Choose any model provider, or plug in your own self-hosted LLM.
Pick the model that works for your use case, swap them at will. Control is yours.

### Company Overview: Onyx

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 6 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W24  

---

**Mission:**  
Onyx aims to revolutionize workplace efficiency with its open-source AI assistant and enterprise search tool, designed to simplify how teams find, access, and utilize information.

**What is Onyx?**  
Imagine an AI assistant like ChatGPT, but tailored for your organization. Onyx seamlessly connects to all your companyâs tools and documents, significantly reducing the time spent on searching for data. If youâre familiar with Glean, think of Onyx as its open-source counterpart. 

**Data Security:**  
One of the significant selling points of Onyx is its approach to data security. By being open-source and designed for self-hosting, Onyx allows companies to deploy their AI assistant within their virtual private cloud (VPC), ensuring that no data ever leaves an organizationâs infrastructure. This means setting it up is not just easy, but securely contained in less than 30 minutes.

**Core Features:**

- **Integrations:** Onyx boasts over 40 integrations with popular applications like Asana, Google Drive, GitHub, and Slack, among others. This breadth allows users to sync data in real-time across multiple platforms seamlessly.
   
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Users can create AI assistants that leverage their organization's unique knowledge, ensuring that help is available right where work happens.

- **Advanced Document Access:** Onyx employs document-level permissions, enhancing security and ensuring that users only access what they need.

- **Customizable APIs:** Developers can utilize open-source APIs to build tailored workflows that suit their team's individual needs.

**Target Audience:**  
Onyx is built for everyoneâfrom operational teams needing swift access to vital information to developers who require a robust platform for custom workflows.

---

**Current Initiatives:**  
1. **Assistants:** Creating bespoke AI assistants that cater to team-specific requirements.
2. **Search:** Enhancing the ability for organizations to locate information quickly across all integrated applications.
3. **OnyxBot:** A dedicated feature to facilitate real-time communication with the AI assistant.

### Join the Conversation  
Want to learn more? Get involved with the Onyx community via [Github](https://github.com/onyx-dot-app/onyx) or check out their official site at [onyx.app](https://www.onyx.app).

### Final Thought  
Onyx isnât just another AI tool; itâs a lean, mean, information-finding machine, built with security and flexibility at its core. If you've been bogged down by information overload, Onyx might just be the solution that helps you unleash your teamâs potential.
